title: Store
body: Is there a way to browse the store when you're not in the actual game? Like a mobile app or on leagueoflegends.com? I'm currently borrowing my friend's laptop while he works on my computer and his firewalls stop me from accessing the store.

replies.body:
The short answer is:  No.  This is something that has been discussed in the past, but as of now the only way to access the store is through the client itself.

I wish I had better news!  Let me know if you have any other questions!
